local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above it, lower until contact to place the white plate, verify contact, open gripper to release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already held in the gripper
Red plate is visible and reachable from current arm pose
Workspace allows safe descent to contact without collisions
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase of the global plan: detect red plate, approach above it, execute controlled placement by lowering until contact, release the white plate, and retreat to a safe pose.
